title: Oregon Caves National Monument & Preserve: Big Tree Trail
body: The Big Tree Trail         View of the Big Tree on the Big Tree trail.   Big Tree Trail Map, 138 KB pdf file Distance: 3.3 miles (5.3 km) loop, 1.3 miles (2.1 km) to Big Tree Duration: allow 2 to 3 hours Elevation Gain: 1,100 feet (335 m) from archway Trailhead: archway behind the Visitor Center This is a great afternoon hike. This hike takes about half a day to complete because it is quite a steep climb. This trail takes hikers through beautiful scenery, mountain meadows, and past the widest girthed Douglas fir tree known to exist in Oregon.
